net.kuujo.vertigo.platform

Interface PlatformManager


  • public interface PlatformManager
    Local module system manager.

    The platform manager facilitates zipping, installing, uninstalling, and deploying modules. This allows Vertigo to read the local module system and distribute modules across the Vertigo cluster.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Detail

      • getModuleInfo

        PlatformManager getModuleInfo(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Collection<ModuleInfo>>> resultHandler)
        Loads module info for all local modules.
        Parameters:
        resultHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once complete. The handler will be called with a collection of module info from which the module identifier and configuration can be read.
        Returns:
        The platform manager.

      • getModuleInfo

        PlatformManager getModuleInfo(String moduleName,
                            org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<ModuleInfo>> doneHandler)
        Loads module info for a local module.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - The name of the module for which to load info.
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once complete.
        Returns:
        The platform manager.

      • zipModule

        PlatformManager zipModule(String zipFile,
                        org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<String>> doneHandler)
        Zips a local module.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - The name of the module to zip.
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once complete. The handler will be called with the full path to the module zip file.
        Returns:
        The platform manager.

      • installModule

        PlatformManager installModule(String moduleZip,
                            org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Void>> doneHandler)
        Installs a module from a zip file.
        Parameters:
        moduleZip - The full path to the module zip file.
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once complete.
        Returns:
        The platform manager.

      • uninstallModule

        PlatformManager uninstallModule(String moduleName,
                              org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Void>> doneHandler)
        Uninstalls a locally installed module.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - The name of the module to uninstall.
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once complete.
        Returns:
        The platform manager.

      • deployModule

        PlatformManager deployModule(String moduleName,
                           org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject config,
                           int instances,
                           org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<String>> doneHandler)
        Deploys a local module.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - The name of the module to deploy.
        config - The module configuration.
        instances - The number of instances to deploy.
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called with the unique deployment ID.
        Returns:
        The platform manager.

      • deployVerticle

        PlatformManager deployVerticle(String main,
                             org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject config,
                             int instances,
                             org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<String>> doneHandler)
        Deploys a verticle.
        Parameters:
        main - The verticle main.
        config - The verticle configuration.
        instances - The number of instances to deploy.
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once complete.
        Returns:
        The platform manager.

      • deployWorkerVerticle

        PlatformManager deployWorkerVerticle(String main,
                                   org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject config,
                                   int instances,
                                   boolean multiThreaded,
                                   org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<String>> doneHandler)
        Deploys a worker verticle.
        Parameters:
        main - The verticle main.
        config - The verticle configuration.
        instances - The number of instances to deploy.
        multiThreaded - Whether the verticle should be deployed multi-threaded.
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once complete.
        Returns:
        The platform manager.

      • undeployModule

                             org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Void>> doneHandler)
        Undeploys a module from the local container.
        Parameters:
        deploymentID - The module deployment ID.

        Returns:
        The platform manager.
